diff_hunk:
@@ -304,7 +304,7 @@ if (USE_MKL AND USE_IDEEP)
   
   if (MKLDNN_INCLUDE_DIR)
     list(APPEND IDEEP_INCLUDE_DIR ${MKLDNN_INCLUDE_DIR})
-    list(APPEND __ideep_looked_for ${MKLDNN_INCLUDE_DIR})
+    list(APPEND __ideep_looked_for MKLDNN_INCLUDE_DIR)
body:
$ cmake -version
cmake version 3.5.1

CMake suite maintained and supported by Kitware (kitware.com/cmake).

-------------------------------------------

**without this fix:
before __ideep_looked_for: /home/jgu21/workspace/src/intel_pytorch/third_party/ideep/mkl-dnn/include
-- Could NOT find IDEEP (missing:  /home/jgu21/workspace/src/intel_pytorch/third_party/ideep/mkl-dnn/include)
after __ideep_looked_for: /home/jgu21/workspace/src/intel_pytorch/third_party/ideep/mkl-dnn/include
CMake Error at cmake/Modules/FindMKL.cmake:362 (message):
  Did not find IDEEP files!

------------------------------------------

**with this fix:
before __ideep_looked_for: MKLDNN_INCLUDE_DIR
-- Found IDEEP: /home/jgu21/workspace/src/intel_pytorch/third_party/ideep/mkl-dnn/include
after __ideep_looked_for: MKLDNN_INCLUDE_DIR
-- Found IDEEP (include: /home/jgu21/workspace/src/intel_pytorch/third_party/ideep/include;/home/jgu21/workspace/src/intel_pytorch/third_party/ideep/mkl-dnn/include, lib: /home/jgu21/workspace/src/intel_pytorch/zz/lib/libmkldnn.so)
